title: [Shawn_Kelly]Animation Tips Tricks(pdf){Zzzzz}
description:
This treasure trove of information will give you an in-depth look at techniques professional animators use to create the movies, TV shows and special effects you love. This ebook is a collection of articles written by Shawn Kelly who is a co-founder of AnimationMentor.com. He is also the winner of the 2008 VES award for The Best Single Visual Effect of the Year for his work on Tranformers and he continues to work full-time at Industrial Light Magic as an animator.
